title: Android
description: Mobil dasturlashni o'rganing va dunyodagi eng ko'p tarqalgan Operatsion Tizim (Android) uchun ilovalar yarating.

title: iOS (Apple)
description: Mobil dasturlashni o'rganing va iOS (Apple tizimi) platformasi uchun chiroyli interfaysli ilovalar yarating.

title: HTML 5
description: HTML - Hyper Text Markup Language (Gipermatnli Belgilash Tili), HTMLni o'rganing chunki, u web saytlarning asosi.

title: CSS 3
description: CSS - Cascading Style Sheet (Kaskadli Stillar Varog'i), CSSni o'rganing va chiroyli dizanga ega web saytlar yarating.

title: Java Script
description: Java Script dasturlash tilini biz bilan o'rganing va yuqori malakali Frontend dasturchiga aylaning.

title: Linux OS
description: Markazimizga tashrif buyuring va dasturchilar ichida ommalashgan Linux OS platformasida ishlash ko'nikmalarini o'rganing.

title: MacOS
description: Markazimizga tashrif buyuring va Apple gigantining Mac OS platformasida ishlash ko'nikmalarini o'rganing.

title: Windows OS
description: Markazimizga tashrif buyuring va eng ko'p foydalanuvchiga ega bo'lgan Windows OS platformasida ishlash ko'nikmalarini o'rganing.

title: Node Js
description: Node Js Java Scriptning Backend uchun yaratilgan framework. Node js ni o'rganing va Fullstack dasturchiga aylaning.

title: React Js
description: React Js - bu java scriptning web ilovalar va UI uchun ishlab chiqilgan kutubxonasi.
